text: The 2022 Winter Paralympics (), officially known as the XIII Paralympic Winter Games and commonly known as the Beijing 2022 Paralympic Games, are an international winter multi-sport parasports event. It took place in Beijing, People's Republic of China, from 4 to 13 March 2022. ==References== Category:March 2022 events Category:2022 in China Category:2022 in Asian sport Category:Sport in Beijing Category:Winter Paralympic Games
title: 2022 Winter Paralympics
